synopsis.p: Looks for mentions of chemicals and molecule names using Chemspot.

description.p: runs Chemspot on the sections content, then creates an annotation for each chemical mention in the layer targetLayerName. Each annotation will have the feature chemTypeFeatureName set to the chemical mention type, and one feature for each type of identifier.

param-doc.name: javaHome
param-doc.p: Root directory of the Java implementation.

param-doc.name: noDict
param-doc.p: Do not use lexicons, only the CRF classifier. Uses less memory.

param-doc.name: targetLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer where to store annotations created by .

param-doc.name: chemTypeFeatureName
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the chemical type (SYSTEMATIC, IDENTIFIER, FORMULA, TRIVIAL, ABBREVIATION, FAMILY, MULTIPLE, UNKNOWN).

param-doc.name: chidFeatureName
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the CHID identifier.

param-doc.name: chebFeatureName
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the CHEB identifier.

param-doc.name: casFeatureName
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the CAS identifier.

param-doc.name: pubcFeatureName
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the PUBC identifier.

param-doc.name: pubsFeatureName
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the PUBS identifier.

param-doc.name: inchFeatureName
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the INCH identifier.

param-doc.name: drugFeatureName
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the DRUG identifier.

param-doc.name: hmdbFeatureName
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the HMBD identifier.

param-doc.name: keggFeatureName
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the KEGG identifier.

param-doc.name: kegdFeatureName
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the KEGD identifier.

param-doc.name: meshFeatureName
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the MESH identifier.

param-doc.name: fdaFeatureName
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the FDA identifier.

param-doc.name: fdaDateFeatureName
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the FDA_DATE identifier.
